meanings.sent1: The document was copyable, so I made a duplicate.
meanings.sent2: The copyable file was easily replicated on the computer.
meanings.sent3: The copyable paper seemed to have a twin!
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so neat, it was almost copyable by anyone.
meanings.sent5: The instructions were so clear that they made the process copyable for everyone.

meanings.sent1: The machine created a copyable version of the key.
meanings.sent2: The copyable image could be printed multiple times.
meanings.sent3: The copyable cake was so delicious, I had to make more!
meanings.sent4: His talent was so copyable, others tried to imitate him.
meanings.sent5: The design was so copyable that it inspired many artists to create similar pieces.
